title: What is the solution for HP Windows 10 freezing? - Quora

response.answer_text: There can be many reasons starting from corrupt os files (which can be fixed with the fresh start of the os) to the corrupt hardware which might need repair or replacement. If it's just an OS problem I would suggest you download a fresh copy of Windows and reinstall it if you have some budget to spend get an SSD and HDD caddy and use SSD as your main drive this will give a new life to your laptop.

A hard freeze situation is usually a corrupted operating system or a hardware fault. Make a Ubuntu Linux boot DVD. When you boot the DVD you can run a very good RSM test. Boot the DVD and run in LIVE MODE. It is a pretty good hardware test.
